org.apache.pig.piggybank.storage.allloader

Class LoadFuncHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.pig.piggybank.storage.allloader.LoadFuncHelper

  • public class LoadFuncHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the logic for finding a LoadFunc based on the definition of:
    • file.extension.loaders
    • file.format.loaders

    • Field Summary

      org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path determineFirstFile(java.lang.String location)
      If location is a directory the first file found is returned
      org.apache.pig.FuncSpec determineFunction(java.lang.String location)
      If location is a directory the first file found in the directory is used.
      The file extension of the file will be searched against the file.extension.loaders mappings.

      The file extension of the file will be searched against the file.extension.loaders mappings.

      • determineFunction

        public org.apache.pig.FuncSpec determineFunction(java.lang.String location)
                                          throws java.io.IOException
        If location is a directory the first file found in the directory is used.
        The file extension of the file will be searched against the file.extension.loaders mappings. If none found null is returned.
        Parameters:
        location -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • determineFunction

        public org.apache.pig.FuncSpec determineFunction(java.lang.String location,
                                        org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path path)
                                          throws java.io.IOException
        The file extension of the file will be searched against the file.extension.loaders mappings. If none found null is returned.

        location -

        Throws:
